text: The Deathsword's have ruled the Grey Mountains for generations, their name revered throughout the entire pass. The Margraves that stem from this Noble family have held the Mountain Valley against numerous threats for decades. Expertly training the Fortress Garrison to operate both in siege warfare and in the rugged mountain climate. The garrison's elite proudly bears the Von Mackensen banner.
Ah, so that is where the name comes from..

Originally the Watch Captain of Ubersreik, X was drafted to serve as Captain Guard in the Fortress of Helmgart. X is a bear of a man unfased by the cold climate of the Grey Mountains and has faced all kinds of threats in the melting pot that is Ubersreik. His presence on the Fortress Walls inspire the brethren facing any foe daring enough to climb their final fate.
Recognizeable by two unique red engraved swords which are rumoured to hold fragments of the essence of all the four Chaos Gods.
